Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can demonstrate a device that allows two people to communicate using sound over a distance.
The student can represent the use of string and cups as tools to solve the problem of communication.
The student can include elements in the drawing that show sound traveling through the string.
The student can illustrate how the device, such as the string telephone, connects two students to communicate.
The student can show why communicating with a device like this is helpful for talking over long distances.
The student can make sure that all necessary parts of the string telephone are labeled in the drawing.
